data.eml:eml: A new species of dactyloid anole (SQUAMATA: IGUANIDAE) from the western Andes of Ecuador

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ayala-Varela, Fernando P., Velasco, Julián Andrés (2010): A new species of dactyloid anole (SQUAMATA: IGUANIDAE) from the western Andes of Ecuador. Zootaxa 2577: 46-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.197522
